gov.nih.nlm.ling.brat

Interface Annotation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Annotation>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAnnotation, EventAnnotation, ModificationAnnotation, PredicationAnnotation, RelationAnnotation, TermAnnotation

    public interface Annotation
extends java.lang.Comparable<Annotation>
    The interface for an abstract natural language annotation. It also defines methods to compare two annotations for evaluation purposes.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Method Summary

      • spanMatch

        boolean spanMatch(Annotation annotation1)
        Indicates whether this annotation matches annotation1 based on span only.
        Parameters:
        annotation1 - the annotation to compare
        Returns:
        true if the annotations are a span match

      • referenceMatch

        boolean referenceMatch(boolean approximateMatch,
                       Annotation annotation1)
        Indicates whether this annotation matches annotation1 based on ontological mapping.
        Parameters:
        approximateMatch - true if the underlying comparison will be based on approximate matching
        annotation1 - the annotation to compare
        Returns:
        true if the annotations are a reference match

      • toResolvedString

        java.lang.String toResolvedString()
        Gets the resolved string representation of this annotation. Term identifiers are replaced with their text and span information.

        the resolved string representation
